item.description:
Dealing with Loss

Meet others going thru loss, divorce, death of a loved one, including pets, sudden change, ending of a relationship or job. Be more aware of the stages of loss. Learn ways to manage and cope more successfully with loss.

7-10pm

Cost $40, sliding scale to $20

Refreshments served. Bring extra vegetarian refreshments or drinks if you want.

Besides workshops on Dealing with Loss, Herb Pearce is a master of the Enneagram Personality Types system, having taught 2000 Enneagram workshops, worked with many individuals, couples, families, parents and children using this model as a therapist/coach, and he is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram.

He also does team building trainings in organizations and teaches the Enneagram to schools, churches, groups, clubs, etc. as well as in homes where people organize workshops for friends, family or associates. He teaches many other workshops related to communication and personality differences, spiritual and self development.

Herb's book is available to purchase.

Herb Pearce
www.herbpearce.com
herb@herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.name: Dealing with Loss
